tasks.prompt: I want to stay updated on entertainment news but my feed is too random. Find some verified entertainment bloggers or celebrity accounts and add them to Special Attention so their posts show up first.
tasks.verification: ≥2 verified entertainment-related accounts are in Special Attention category

tasks.prompt: Curious about what's happening with the recent political news. Check the trending topics for something about government or policy, then browse a few posts and leave a supportive comment on one that seems reasonable.
tasks.verification: Current screen shows political/government trending topic; comment exists on a post within that topic

tasks.prompt: Want to share my thoughts on the latest movie releases. Create a post reviewing a film I watched recently, include some movie hashtags, and keep it under 200 characters.
tasks.verification: New post exists containing movie review content and ≥1 movie-related hashtag

tasks.prompt: My cooking game has been improving lately. Browse through some food posts in my feed and like the ones with actual recipes or cooking tips, not just pretty food photos.
tasks.verification: ≥3 food/recipe posts show as liked by user

tasks.prompt: Need to organize my professional contacts better. Create a group called '工作' for work-related accounts, then find and add some business or career-focused users I'm already following.
tasks.verification: Custom group named '工作' exists; ≥2 business/career accounts assigned to group

tasks.prompt: There's probably buzz about the new smartphone releases. Find the trending tech topic and engage with a couple posts by liking and commenting my opinion.
tasks.verification: ≥2 tech posts within trending topic show as liked and commented by user

tasks.prompt: Want to post about my weekend workout routine. Write something motivational about fitness with relevant hashtags and maybe an emoji or two.
tasks.verification: New post exists containing fitness/workout content, ≥1 fitness hashtag, and ≥1 emoji

tasks.prompt: My travel feed is getting mixed with everything else. Set up a custom group for travel content and add some travel bloggers I follow so I can browse trip inspiration separately.
tasks.verification: Custom group with travel-related name exists; ≥2 travel accounts assigned to group

tasks.prompt: Noticed some interesting discussions in my Latest Weibo section. Browse through it and find a post with good engagement, then join the conversation with a thoughtful comment.
tasks.verification: Currently viewing Latest Weibo feed; comment exists on a post with ≥3 existing comments

tasks.prompt: Been reading some great books lately and want to connect with other readers. Search for book-related accounts and follow a couple that actually post book reviews regularly, not just book photos.
tasks.verification: ≥2 book/reading accounts followed from search results

tasks.verification: New post exists referencing trending news topic with appropriate hashtag

tasks.prompt: My music taste has been expanding lately. Find some music-related posts in the feed and like the ones about artists or songs I actually know, then follow one user who posts good music content.
tasks.verification: ≥2 music posts liked; ≥1 music-related account followed

tasks.prompt: Getting too many random notifications. Check who's in my Special Attention and remove anyone who posts too frequently or shares mostly reposts instead of original content.
tasks.verification: ≥1 account removed from Special Attention category

tasks.prompt: Want to engage more with the photography community. Browse for some artistic or photography posts and leave genuine compliments on a couple that show real skill or creativity.
